channel.title: Hearts of Wulin, In the Shadow of Dragons: The Soulflame Heresy
channel.description:
![eb618a4d3787d04b1f667bbbc6736a83|564x412](upload://4kYRctfHij3QVlzO1qKN5log20c.jpeg) You are star-crossed warrior-lovers in a mountain monastery ruled by dragons. As your home is rocked by the accusation that human heretics are plotting against the wise and regal dragons, can you uphold your faction's honor, win your heart's desire, and impress Dragonliege Ozukai?
We will be playing a two-shot of [Hearts of Wulin](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/hearts-of-wulin.html), a game of wuxia melodrama, Powered by the Apocalypse. We’ll be testing out a starter and setting I have created called **In The Shadow of Dragons.** The setting is inspired by media where dragons reign over human martial artists, such as *Avatar: The Last Airbender* and Tarkir from the lore of *Magic: The Gathering* .
**NB: This is two-shot over two consecutive nights. We are playing September 2nd and September 3rd.**
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: There will be 2 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
DURATION: 3 hours
NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 4 players total. One slot is reserved for someone who has yet to play Hearts of Wulin. Message me if that is you!
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: We will use CATS, the X-Card, Lines & Veils, and the Open Door Policy. This event abides by the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
SET UP INFO: We will play over Streamyard. Expect a set-up email from me about a week before the first session, with a link to a Google sheet character keeper.
BREAKS: two ten-minute breaks (and more as requested)
RECORDED: Provided all players give permission, sessions will be recorded and posted to the Cloven Pine Games Youtube channel.
PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
